name: Rebook
description: React eBook reader with bookmarks, highlights, and annotations, which can all be exported to markdown.
blurb: A user-friendly e-book reader app built with React

name: Portfolio
description: This site! Responsive with accessibility features like dark mode, semantic HTML, and proper aria attributes. Built with Next.js.

name: KMK Firmware Modules
description: RapidFire & String Substitution modules for KMK Firmware, an open-source firmware project for custom-built keyboards.
blurb: RapidFire and String Substitution modules for KMK Firmware.

name: Klink
description: Link-sharing backend utilizing a microservice architecture built with Go, FastAPI, RabbitMQ, and PostgreSQL.
blurb: Arcade game entry for a game jam competition.

name: Zipper
description: A FastAPI + React web app for uploading small files to a server, which are then compressed and returned to the user.
blurb: A web app for compressing small files on the go.

name: Connexit
description: Puzzle game where shapes with various behaviors must be navigated to their respective goals for the player to progress.
blurb: A puzzle game built in Godot as a submission for a game jam competition

name: Overbooked
description: Arcade game where the player needs to sort as many library books into shelves as they can before time runs out.
blurb: Arcade game entry for a game jam competition.

name: PyWinModal
description: Productivity tool with a simple API to execute user-defined commands through a customizable modal popup.

name: wordlist-generator
description: A small CLI that provides a list of words which contain some combination of a given set of characters.
blurb: A word generation tool for practicing typing.
